title: UDL Implementation Strategies for Online Computer Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational programming concepts and mathematical reasoning skills
context.additional_context: A course where learners from diverse professional backgrounds complete computer science education based on UDL principles in a smartphone-centric learning environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain algorithm design methods using mobile-friendly learning modules designed according to UDL principles.
Learners apply mathematical concepts—provided through multiple representations (text/audio/visual materials)—to real-world programming problems.
Learners analyze and present practical applications of computer science theories through flexible assessment methods.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
